Whitemane.name: Desperate Plea
Whitemane.description: Heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and gain Desperation for 4 seconds.  Desperation increases Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 45, and stacks up to 3 times.  Current Mana Cost: 45

Whitemane.name: Inquisition
Whitemane.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for up to 3 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds and Slowing them by 30%. Removes a stack of Desperation.  Shares a cooldown with Clemency.

Whitemane.name: Searing Lash
Whitemane.description: After 0.5 seconds, smite enemies in a straight line for 82 (+4% per level) damage.  If the first strike hits an enemy Hero, a second strike will occur after a short delay.

Whitemane.name: Scarlet Aegis
Whitemane.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 300 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

Whitemane.name: Divine Reckoning
Whitemane.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.

Whitemane.name: Zeal
Whitemane.description: Whitemane's healing Abilities apply Zeal for 8 seconds. Allies with Zeal are healed for 100% of the damage Whitemane deals to Heroes.  Activate to gain 25% Spell Power and lose 25 Armor for 5 seconds. Can be cast while channeling abilities.

Whitemane.name: Clemency
Whitemane.description: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 329 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds while Channeling. Removes a stack of Desperation  Shares a cooldown with Inquisition.

1.name: Pity the Frail
1.description: For every Hero hit with Searing Lash, lower the cooldown of Inquisition by 1.5 seconds. Allies below 30% Health receive 25% more healing from Whitemane.

1.name: Righteous Flame
1.description: Searing Lash deals 25% more damage to enemies. If the second strike hits an enemy Hero, they take an additional 25% damage and Whitemane gains 40% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

1.name: Inquisitor's Prayer
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Searing Lash.  Reward: Each Hero hit grants 3 permanent Health and 2 permanent Mana. Heroes hit with the second strike count as 2 hits.

4.name: Unwavering Faith
4.description: Increase Whitemane's Basic Attack range by 1.1. Whitemane gains 20% increased Basic Attack damage for each active Zeal buff.

4.name: Martyrdom
4.description: Desperate Plea's healing is increased by 30%. Increase this by an additional 10% for each active Zeal.

4.name: Indulgence
4.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Increase this by an additional 5% for each active Zeal.

7.name: Zealous Spirit
7.description: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.

7.name: Saintly Greatstaff
7.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Searing Lash are marked for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 55 (+4% per level) Spell damage and remove the mark.

7.name: Intercession
7.description: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.

10.name: Scarlet Aegis
10.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 300 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

10.name: Divine Reckoning
10.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.

13.name: Subjugation
13.description: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 50%.

13.name: Lashing Out
13.description: If Searing Lash's second strike hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown to 1 second.

13.name: Scarlet Wrath
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the duration of all active Zeals by 0.75 seconds and lower the cooldown of Zeals activation by 4 seconds.

16.name: Radiance
16.description: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175 (+4% per level). Activating Zeal while at 3 stacks of Desperation now increases Armor by 15 instead of reducing it.

16.name: Shared Punishment
16.description: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds. Affected enemies lose 10 Armor.

16.name: Harsh Discipline
16.description: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Scarlet Crusade
20.description: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

20.name: Judgment Day
20.description: Divine Reckoning deals 50% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.

20.name: Guiding Light
20.description: Activate to cast a permanent Zeal on an allied Hero that costs no Mana and doesn't grant Desperation. Only one can be active at a time and has global cast range.

20.name: Purge the Wicked
20.description: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.
